mapper.select: SELECT P.PRJ_ID , P.PRJ_NAME , P.CLNT_INFO , P.DEPT_ID , P.PRJ_STS , TO_CHAR(P.STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , P.DEL_YN , P.CRT_DT , P.MDFR_ID , P.MDF_DT , C.CMCD_NAME , D.DEPT_NAME FROM PROJECT P INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON P.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON P.PRJ_STS = C.CMCD_ID WHERE P.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY P.CRT_DT DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROJECT WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT P.PRJ_ID , P.PRJ_NAME , P.CLNT_INFO , P.DEPT_ID , P.PRJ_STS , TO_CHAR(P.STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , P.DEL_YN , P.CRTR_ID , P.CRT_DT , P.MDFR_ID , P.MDF_DT , C.CMCD_NAME , D.DEPT_NAME , CL.CLNT_NAME , P.SRV_STS , P.SRV_CR_DATE , P.SRV_END_DATE FROM PROJECT P INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON P.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON P.PRJ_STS = C.CMCD_ID INNER JOIN CLIENT CL ON CL.CLNT_ID = P.CLNT_INFO WHERE P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND P.PRJ_STS = #{searchStatus}
AND P.PRJ_ID IN ( SELECT PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_TEAMMATE PT WHERE PT.TM_ID = #{employeeVO.empId} AND PT.DEL_YN = 'N' )
ORDER BY P.CRT_DT DESC

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROJECT P INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON P.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON P.PRJ_STS = C.CMCD_ID WHERE P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND P.PRJ_STS = #{searchStatus}
AND P.PRJ_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND P.CLNT_INFO LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND D.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND P.PRJ_ID IN ( SELECT PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_TEAMMATE PT WHERE PT.TM_ID = #{employeeVO.empId} AND PT.DEL_YN = 'N' )

SELECT P.PRJ_ID , P.PRJ_NAME , P.CLNT_INFO , P.DEPT_ID , P.PRJ_STS , TO_CHAR(P.STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DT , P.DEL_YN , P.CRTR_ID , P.CRT_DT , P.MDFR_ID , P.MDF_DT , C.CMCD_NAME , D.DEPT_NAME , PT."ROLE" , PT.TM_ID , E.EMP_NAME , P.PRJ_MEMO , CL.CLNT_NAME , CL.CNTCT , CL.INFO FROM (SELECT PRJ_ID , PRJ_NAME , CLNT_INFO , DEPT_ID , PRJ_STS , STRT_DT , END_DT , DEL_YN , CRTR_ID , CRT_DT , MDFR_ID , MDF_DT , PRJ_MEMO FROM PROJECT WHERE PRJ_ID = #{_parameter}) P INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON P.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON P.PRJ_STS = C.CMCD_ID INNER JOIN PROJECT_TEAMMATE PT ON P.PRJ_ID = PT.PRJ_ID INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON PT.TM_ID = E.EMP_ID INNER JOIN CLIENT CL ON CL.CLNT_ID = P.CLNT_INFO WHERE P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND PT.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT (PRJ_ID, PRJ_NAME, CLNT_INFO, DEPT_ID, PRJ_STS, STRT_DT, END_DT, DEL_YN, CRTR_ID, SRV_STS, PRJ_MEMO) VALUES (('PRJ_' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 3) || '_' || LPAD(SEQ_PROJECT_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0')), #{prjName}, #{clntInfo}, #{deptId}, '401', TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{endDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'N', #{crtrId}, 'N', #{prjMemo})

INSERT INTO PROJECT_TEAMMATE (PRJ_TM_ID, PRJ_ID, TM_ID, ROLE, DEL_YN, RV_YN, SRV_YN) VALUES (('PRJ_TM_' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 3) || '_' || LPAD(SEQ_PROJECT_TEAMMATE_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0')), #{prjId}, #{tmId}, #{role}, 'N', 'N', 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROJECT_TEAMMATE PT INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON PT.TM_ID = E.EMP_ID WHERE PT.PRJ_ID = #{_parameter} AND PT.DEL_YN = 'N' AND E.WORK_STS != '204'

SELECT PT.PRJ_TM_ID, PT.PRJ_ID, PT.TM_ID, PT."ROLE", PT.DEL_YN, PT.RV_YN, PT.SRV_YN, E.EMP_ID, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMAIL, D.DEPT_ID, D.DEPT_NAME FROM PROJECT_TEAMMATE PT INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON PT.TM_ID = E.EMP_ID INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID WHERE PT.DEL_YN = 'N' AND PT.PRJ_ID = #{_parameter} ORDER BY "ROLE" DESC

SELECT C.CMCD_NAME , COUNT(R.RQM_ID) AS CMCD_ID_COUNT FROM PROJECT P INNER JOIN REQUIREMENT R ON P.PRJ_ID =R.PRJ_ID RIGHT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON R.RQM_STS = C.CMCD_ID WHERE C.CMCD_PID = '600' AND P.PRJ_ID = #{_parameter} AND P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND R.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY C.CMCD_NAME

SELECT C.CMCD_NAME , COUNT(I.IS_ID) AS CMCD_ID_COUNT FROM PROJECT P INNER JOIN REQUIREMENT R ON P.PRJ_ID = R.PRJ_ID INNER JOIN ISSUE I ON R.RQM_ID = I.RQM_ID RIGHT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON I.IS_STS = C.CMCD_ID WHERE C.CMCD_PID = '700' AND P.PRJ_ID = #{_parameter} AND P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND R.DEL_YN = 'N' AND I.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY C.CMCD_NAME
mapper.update: UPDATE PROJECT_TEAMMATE SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE PRJ_ID=#{_parameter} AND "ROLE"='PM' AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT PRJ_TM_ID, PRJ_ID, TM_ID, "ROLE", DEL_YN, RV_YN, SRV_YN FROM PROJECT_TEAMMATE WHERE PRJ_ID = #{_parameter} AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND "ROLE" = 'PM'
SELECT E.EMP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E INNER JOIN PROJECT_TEAMMATE P ON P.TM_ID = E.EMP_ID WHERE P.PRJ_ID = #{_parameter} AND P."ROLE" = 'PM' AND P.DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT PRJ_TM_ID, PRJ_ID, TM_ID, "ROLE", DEL_YN, RV_YN, SRV_YN FROM PROJECT_TEAMMATE WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND TM_ID = #{pmId} AND ROLE = 'PM'
mapper.update:
UPDATE PROJECT_TEAMMATE SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE PRJ_TM_ID IN
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT PRJ_TM_ID, PRJ_ID , TM_ID, "ROLE" , DEL_YN FROM PROJECT_TEAMMATE WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND TM_ID = #{tmId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT_TEAMMATE (PRJ_TM_ID, PRJ_ID, TM_ID, "ROLE") VALUES ( 'PRJ_TM_' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 3) || '_' || LPAD(SEQ_PROJECT_TEAMMATE_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0'), #{prjId}, #{tmId}, #{role} )
mapper.select: SELECT PRJ_TM_ID, PRJ_ID , TM_ID, "ROLE" , DEL_YN, RV_YN, SRV_YN FROM PROJECT_TEAMMATE WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT P.PRJ_ID, P.PRJ_NAME, P.CLNT_INFO, P.DEPT_ID, P.PRJ_STS, P.STRT_DT, P.END_DT, D.DEPT_NAME, C.CMCD_NAME FROM PROJECT P INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON P.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON P.PRJ_STS = C.CMCD_ID WHERE P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND PRJ_ID IN (SELECT PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_TEAMMATE PT WHERE PT.TM_ID = #{_parameter} AND PT.DEL_YN = 'N') ORDER BY P.CRT_DT DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROJECT_TEAMMATE PT WHERE PRJ_ID = #{_parameter} AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND PT."ROLE" = 'PL'
mapper.update: UPDATE PROJECT SET SRV_STS = 'Y' WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT PT.PRJ_TM_ID , PT.PRJ_ID , PT.TM_ID , PT.ROLE , PT.DEL_YN , PT.RV_YN , PT.SRV_YN FROM PROJECT_TEAMMATE PT JOIN PROJECT P ON PT.PRJ_ID = P.PRJ_ID WHERE TM_ID = #{crtrId} AND PT.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY P.CRT_DT DESC

SELECT P.PRJ_NAME , TO_CHAR(P.STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DT FROM PROJECT P INNER JOIN PROJECT_TEAMMATE T ON P.PRJ_ID = T.PRJ_ID WHERE T.TM_ID = #{_parameter} AND (P.STRT_DT > SYSDATE OR P.END_DT > SYSDATE) AND P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T.DEL_YN = 'N'
